text: @markknoller @realDonaldTrump Lowering the flag while this fraud in the WH continues to fail to protect the country from COVID19 is obscene! He has failed in his duty to act responsibly in the face of a deadly virus that is killing people daily. Lowering the flag is meaningless!!!!!
